short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The website and browser extension that lets you ask questions about anything you come across online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you've ever been browsing the internet and found yourself wondering "Eh, I wonder what that is?" - we've got just the thing for you. Highlight some text, ask a question and get answers.
